name: Automated Github Org Repository Invites
description: Out-of-the-box solution to automatic Github Organization repository invitations, forked from user thundergolfer

GITHUB_TOKEN.description: A Github access token to activate the Octokit Github Client

REPOSITORY_NAME.description: The repository name to add your collaborators

BACKGROUND_COLOR.description: Background color for front page. Can be one of [grey, white, blue, green, red, pink]
